meanings.sent1: I composted my kitchen scraps to make nutrient-rich soil for my garden.
meanings.sent2: She composted the leaves and grass clippings to create a natural fertilizer.
meanings.sent3: After I composted the banana peels, the soil was so happy it started singing!
meanings.sent4: Her ideas composted in her mind, slowly turning into a brilliant solution.
meanings.sent5: The composted waste transformed into a thriving ecosystem of microorganisms and worms.

meanings.sent1: The gardener spread the composted material over the flower beds.
meanings.sent2: We bought a bag of composted soil to improve the quality of our garden.
meanings.sent3: The composted pile in the backyard looked like a mountain of black gold.
meanings.sent4: The composted mixture smelled earthy and rich, ready to nourish the plants.
meanings.sent5: The composted compost was teeming with life, a testament to its fertility.
